argument.name: Seconds
argument.description: Numeric. The number of seconds between timer events.

page.description: The {INTERVAL} command is used to specify how frequently the timer event fires if a timer event is specified.
page.example: dim cnt as N cnt = 1 ui_modeless_dlg_box("{INTERVAL}",<<%dlg% {timer=increment} {interval=.05} {progress=50cnt} ; %dlg%,<<%code% if a_dlg_button = "increment" then cnt = cnt + 1 if cnt = 100 then cnt = 1 end if end if if a_dlg_button = "close" then ui_modeless_dlg_close("{INTERVAL}") end if %code%)
